post.author: Admin
post.title: First Band Booster Meeting and Freshman Parents/New Members Meeting
post.description: Dear Band Families, Our first Band Booster meeting is next week.  After our regular meetin
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

Our first Band Booster meeting is next week.  After our regular meeting there will be a meeting for new Band Booster Parents (all are welcome).  Here is the information.

First Band Booster Meeting:

Monday, August 18, at 7pm in the High School Performing Arts Center

All parents are welcome!  We encourage all parents to attend the monthly booster meetings.  Please try to make plans to attend at least several monthly meetings each year. We realize it is difficult to commit but valuable information is discussed at these meetings. Normally the meetings are on Monday evenings, once a month at 7:00 pm.

Freshman Parents/New Parents Meeting:

Right after the Band Booster meeting in the High School Performing Arts Center

We are asking the parents of freshman and new members to please stay after the Booster meeting for a very special meeting to introduce you to the Booster organization and the Band program in general. Of course, all members are welcome to stay and participate!  Sportswear and membership will be there along with many of the volunteer committee chairs to explain what we do. There will be a question and answer opportunity as well.  We look forward to seeing you!
